not-found.title: Oops! Page Not Found.
not-found.subtitle: We're sorry, but the page you are looking for cannot be found. It may have been moved, renamed, or temporarily unavailable.

unauthorized.title: Oops! Access Denied.
unauthorized.subtitle: We're sorry, but it seems you don't have permission to access this resource. The requested page or content is restricted and requires higher privileges.

server-error.title: Oops! Internal Server Error.
server-error.subtitle: We apologize for the inconvenience, but it seems that something went wrong on our end.Our team is already working diligently to fix the issue. Please try again later.
